overview:
Tim Gnazale authors books and articles for literary distribution, serves as a consultant in fitness and wellness, plus markets technology and consumer services.

Tim is presently extablishing the “Stilettos in Motion” charitable channel to donate 100% of the profit from his new book “Tai Chi for Stiletto Heels” to the “Born This Way Foundation,” and other charities Stephanie Germanotta (AKA Lady Gaga) engages. Tim has authored 3 other books in fitness and has been published in American Fitness magazine. He is a martial arts competition medalist and judge, 22-year T’ai chi instructor and 20-year fitness professional through the American College of Sports Medicine.

Motion Dynamicx was established in 1988 in Silicon Valley, California as a company devoted to time-measurement study for the technological and medical industries. Today it has shifted paradigm as a portal for fitness, leisure activity and marketing consulting.
